headline: Trump’s Vision of the Presidency on Trial
abstract: The president believes that what is good for him and what is good for the country are indistinguishable.
lead_paragraph: When the trial of President Trump begins, perhaps as soon as this week, the Senate will formally confront only the two questions posed by the articles of impeachment passed in the House of Representatives. Did Mr. Trump abuse the powers of his office in his interactions with Ukraine? And did he obstruct Congress’s investigation of that matter?
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
